column1: '''Cermië''' ([[Cerveth]] in [[Sindarin]]) was the seventh month of the year in the [[King's Reckoning]] and the [[Stewards' Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]]
column3: and preceding [[Úrimë]]. In the [[New Reckoning]] it was the fourth month of the year

column1: ''Cermië'' in the Kings' Reckoning and in the Stewards' Reckoning corresponded
column3: to [[Afterlithe]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[24 June]] through [[23 July]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
